value.title: Extract in Power Query (LEN, LEFT, RIGHT in excel) - #6 (M)agic (M)ondays
value.excerpt: In today's video we will go through the equivalents of LEN, LEFT; RIGHT in Power Query. You can create very complex transformations using the interface in Power Query.  Keynotes: 02:46 -Text Before delimiter 03:37 - Count lenth of text 04:03 - Extract First character 04:11 - Extract Last Character 04:16

value.title: Fix errors when importing or converting date columns in Power BI - Power BI Tips & Tricks #21
value.excerpt: Today I will show you how to fix the errors that you get when you try to convert a column to a date in Power BI/ Power Query. value.title: Get football data for the main championships for free in Power BI
value.excerpt: Do you have football fever or dont know what you are going to do with all those free hours?  In today's video I will show you how you can get free data from the main football competitions for free!  Lets get started and Merry christmas!  API quick start: https://www.football-data.org/documentation/quickstart

value.title: Get Power BI data in Excel without Pivot Tables | Excel Data Types

Let me show you how in today's video!  Here you can download all

value.title: Get previous row in Power Query - EXPLAINED

value.title: Insert blank rows at each category in Power Query
value.excerpt: Have you ever wanted to have a blank row after each category or subcategory, so you can visualize your data in a table?   In this video I will show you how to add a blank row for each group using power query in one step!  Enjoy!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Managing changing column names in Power Query #10: (M)agic (M)ondays
value.excerpt: In today's video, I will show how to manage column headers that changes names so your power bi file does not break when you refresh it.  This tip is from Lars Schreiber and here is the link to his blog post and how to do this in power query: http://power-bi-usergroup.blogspot.se/2015/12/dealing-with-tables-with-changing.html

value.title: Power BI vs Excel: When you should use each tool
value.excerpt: Which tool is best? Power BI or Excel?  Well, it depends on what you are trying to do. Both tools have unique strengths and limitations and in this video I will try to show both.  Hopefully after watching this video, you will have a better understanding of both tools and will know when to use which depending

value.title: Running totals by subcategory in Power Query!!

value.title: Running totals in power query??? Yes, you can :)
value.excerpt: In today's video, I am going to show you how you can do running totals or cummulative totals in Power Query, but do this only if you have no way to do it using DAX.  Also, I will show you how List.Range work, really cool function :)  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Schedule data downloads / exports in Power BI
value.excerpt: You can export data or download data out of Power BI in many different ways and depending on the source, you can schedule refresh those data dumps too. value.title: Forecasting in Power BI
